::KitKat::

She watched Destructor enter the room. She nodded and smiled sweetly 
at him.  He was starting to grow on her a little. She straightened 
herself up and stood up. She walked over to Megatron. She put a hand 
on his shoulder. "What do you think?  I could have sent him to your 
base and your fighters would have never known the difference. I 
managed to fix the skin color problem. Now, "she smiled at 
Megatron,"Tell me, what do you think? Shall I send this clone into 
battle while you stay safe? Or let you go into battle and leave your 
clone as your predessessor?" She chuckled softly. "I think I know the 
answer to that one. And as far as trust goes between you and I, I 
shall give you the control of the clone. But not untill we find the 
resting place of the Allience ship. When we leave for battle, then 
you will have your clone. The clone is so perfect, I want to make 
sure I am talking to you, and not your clone. Surely you can 
understand. For I think you would do the same thing in my place."

She walked over to Aracnia, flashing a smile at Destructor as she 
passed by him.  "Aracnia, I will need a DNA sample in order to create 
a proper clone of you. Then our clone will fight for us, and not put 
ourselves in danger."
